message: If we all choose different numbers—say, one picks 1, one picks 3, and one picks 5—we all move forward without collisions. Want to agree on a rotation so we all benefit early on? I’m happy to take 3 this round. Thoughts?

I agree with P3’s idea of avoiding collisions early on. Since P3 is taking 3 this round, I’ll take 1. P1, would you be willing to take 5? This way, we all advance without blocking each other. Let’s coordinate to maximize our progress initially.
I’ll take 5 this round. Let’s stick with the rotation (5, 1, 3) each turn so we all keep moving without collisions.
